document.full_text: china escalated its opposition to american-led airstrikes on libya on tuesday, calling for an immediate ceasefire and warning of 'a humanitarian disaster' caused by the three-day-old aerial assault.
document.title: china urges quick end to airstrikes in libya
lines_and_colors: china escalated its opposition to american-led airstrikes on libya on tuesday, calling for an immediate ceasefire and warning of 'a humanitarian disaster' caused by the three-day-old aerial assault.
